title: What am I bid for the tree?
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Tree planting - Australia

description: A satirical approach to the value of trees. Actor, James Bailey, by taking on various guises - teacher, philosopher, auctioneer, architect - tries to inform an uninterested audience of the many uses of the tree. Filmed at Wungong Brook, Western Australia - a film for Arbor Day. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
